label: 比叡山
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A famous mountain partially in Shiga-no-kōri, Ōmi-no-kuni, but also partially in Yamashiro-no-kuni.Sometimes abbreviated to Ei-zan. The great Enryaku-ji was located on this mountain. [滋賀郡、近江国、山城国、叡山、延暦寺]
